sentences.english: Though he surfaced from time to time in the years after, Dengar's current whereabouts and activities are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 登加後來時隱時現，他目前的處境和活動不得而知。

sentences.english: DO NOT STOP" – with the monumental mountainscape of the Kenai Peninsula looming across the bay.
sentences.chinese: 克奈半島豐碑式的羣山景色在海灣對面時隱時現。

sentences.english: And disappeared when the mountain is, like the fog around the cloud cover in general, in the blue-colored horizon.
sentences.chinese: 時隱時現的山嶺，象雲遮霧繞一般，在湛藍色的天邊。

sentences.english: Music cries out to us alone, and the full moon winks our way.
sentences.chinese: 音樂只爲我們奏響，那一輪滿月也隨我們時隱時現。

sentences.english: Cha Shan mountains at this time like Joan Tower, and disappeared the next.
sentences.chinese: 此時的槎山宛如仙山瓊閣，時隱時現。

sentences.english: The moon\'s shining face showed up new and then, in and out of the tree leaves as if she was playing a game of hide-and-seek with me.
sentences.chinese: 月亮的臉時隱時現，好像在樹葉中和我捉迷藏。
